*Drazom grabbed a table and blocked Double Punch's shots. Mantella moves her
arm in front of her chest and is hit in the arm by the Optic blast and
grunts while still offering to help Quickstrike* Drazom is hit the one of
ion disks by blocks the others with  the table and he begin flying and
avoided the stinger missiles, Drazom then threw the table at Manterror and
fired 5 fire balls at Injector. Mantella seen the shots and grabbed
Quickstrike and jumped out of the way and the shots hit the wall* (She only
grabs Quickstrike to save him from the missiles, only if the owner says it's
okay)

> (Again, Lizards, Double Punch is invisible.  You'd have to do something
which
> is fairly simple, though understandable if someone doesn't get it.  But
I'm
> not exactly don't wanna tell.  I'll respond to it, but please keep that in
> mind)
>
> Double Punch/Injector/Manterror/Bumblebee:
>
>
> Double Punch sidestepped, letting the flames from Drozom pass him, firing
two
> energy-signature seeking missiles at Drozom's chest.  Beeline dive bombed,
> firing an optic blast at Mantella's chest.
>
> Manterror stumbled back from the fire balls, firing three ion disks at
> Drozom's higher torso, and three at Mantella's abdomen.
>
> Injector stumbled back, firing two stinger missiles at Drozom's chest.
>
> Bumblebee ran into the the room.  Looking at the fire fight, he saw to
> mantises.  "Two mantises, Manterror would be a male name, and that's the
> female...so easy to conclude.." he said almost inaudibly to himself,
firing
> two stinger missiles at Quickstrike, two optic blasts at Mantella.
